column4: can someone help me with static ip setup in 8.10...i created a new connection and set the mac and ip address and all that stuff...It starts fine with that IP address but i cant access the internet....but i can access my linksys router settings fine
have you set your router as the gateway?

No. When you configured your static IP you needed to provide the IP address, network mask and a gateway address. The gateway is your Linksys, it is where all non-local domain IP requests get routed to
hold on - do you have your linksys on one network and your PC's on another?
